entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 26. Humidex 30. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
